By The Numbers   Social Media   News & Events   NYU Stern Street Team     Academics Business Degree   Business & Political Economy Degree   Faculty   Academic Advising   Research   Practitioners Seminar   Stern Bulletin     Stern Around the World International Studies Program   Business & Political Economy Degree Program   Short-Term Immersions   Semester Away     Social Impact Social Impact Curriculum   Social Impact Initiatives     Dynamic Community Building Community   Living & Learning in New York City   Leadership Initiatives   Student Clubs and Organizations     Future Success Professional Development   Internships & Careers     Admissions Financial Aid   Transfer Applicants   Apply               Home / Programs & Admissions / Undergraduate / Academics / Business Degree / Sample 4-year Curriculum                        Share / Print                Print      Email      Share       Like                                              Sample 4-year Curriculum                            Overview                      Freshman Year                      Sophomore Year                      Junior  Year                      Senior Year                            The following is a sample 4-year curriculum for a typical student pursuing Stern's Business degree. Your personal program would vary depending on your individual interests (i.e., concentration, minor[s], study abroad option[s]), and you would work closely with an academic adviser to help you adjust your courses to meet your academic and personal goals.            Liberal Arts Core, Business Core, and Social Impact Core   Writing the Essay Cohort Leadership Program I Microeconomics Calculus I (or higher level math) Business & Its Publics: Inquiry and Discourse Business & Its Publics Statistics for Business Control & Regression/Forecasting Models Texts & Ideas Cultures & Contexts Natural Science Elective Courses            Business Core, Electives, Social Impact Core, and Study Away   Cohort Leadership Program II Principles of Financial Accounting Business Core (select 4 of the following) : Information Technology in Business & Society Management and Organizations Introduction to Marketing Foundations of Finance Principles of Managerial Accounting Operations Management Organizational Communication & its Social Context Economics of Global Business Elective Courses            Electives, Concentration, International Studies, Social Impact Core   International Studies Program Law, Business, & Society Concentration Requirements Elective Courses            Electives, Concentration, Social Impact Core   Professional Responsibility and Leadership Concentration Requirements Elective Courses                                            Take Action Exam4 | NYU School of Law                          Skip to main content                                     ›               Quicklinks       Areas of Study   Calendar   Career Services   Colloquia   Courses   Departments   Directories   Docket   Housing   Library   News and Press   NYU Home   Student Links   Technology                                              JD Admissions   Faculty & Scholarship   Global Opportunities   LLM/JSD Admissions   Academics & Courses   Law & Business   Executive Education   Current Students   Public Service   About NYU Law   Alumni & Giving   Centers & Institutes                               Home › Technology › Students › Exams › Exam4                  Technology                 Exam4                 Exam4       Practice Exam   Features   FAQ               Related Links           Exam4 How-To Video ExamReporter Extegrity's Exam4 Support                            Welcome to the Exam4 instructions page. From here you can find information on how to install the Exam4 software and how to take a practice exam. Installation is easy, and the practice exam will help you become familiar with Exam4 before the day of your exam. It will also ensure that Exam4 works properly on your laptop. It is your responsibility to have working knowledge of the Exam4 features and options.   Exam4 Video   To open the Exam4 How-To Video, click the link on the left under "Related Links", or h ere . This Tutorial Video will orient you with the new exam software, and show you what to expect when taking an exam. If you already feel confident with use of the software, you may skip the video and proceed below.   Download Exam4     Uninstall any previous versions of Exam4   Go the Exam4 website to download the exam software. * Mac users, use the Safari browser.   Download Exam4 software instructions will display. Follow the instructions to download by first completing and submitting the registration form.   Proceed through the download instructions. After reading, check the box to acknowledge you have read and understood them. A download link will display. Save or run this file.    Mac users, click on "Submit form". After clicking the download link, Exam4 will show up in your "Downloads" folder. Move the Exam4 download file to your “Applications” folder.       If you saved the download, open Exam4. If you ran the download, Exam4 will open. At this point, Exam4 should prompt you to take a practice exam .
